jcr:content.jcr:title: Qui-Gon and Obi-Wan: The Aurorient Express

contentheadline.headline: Qui-Gon and Obi-Wan: The Aurorient Express

contentrichtext.text: {{DISPLAYTITLE:''Qui-Gon and Obi-Wan: The Aurorient Express''}} {{Infobox SW Comics | name = Qui-Gon and Obi-Wan: The Aurorient Express | image = Aurorientexpress1.jpg | script = [[Mike Kennedy (comics)|Mike Kennedy]] | cover_art = [[Lucas Marangon]] | pencils = [[Lucas Marangon]] | inks = [[Howard M. Shum]] | lettering = [[Steve Dutro]] | colors = Dan Jackson | art = | designer = | art_dir = | editor = | asst_editor = | asso_editor = | publisher = | era = Rise of the Empire | series = Qui-Gon and Obi-Wan | galactic_year = 38 BBY | canon = C | publishing_co = [[Dark Horse Comics]] | release_date = 27 February 2002<br>12 June 2002 | pages = 32 | size_weight = | isbn = | preceded_by = [[Star Wars Tales Volume 4#The Secret of Tet Ami|The Secret of Tet Ami]] | followed_by = [[Star Wars Tales Volume 3#Once Bitten|Once Bitten]] }} '''''Qui-Gon and Obi-Wan: The Aurorient Express''''' is a two-part comics series written by [[Mike Kennedy (comics)|Mike Kennedy]], and published by [[Dark Horse Comics]] between February 2002 and June 2002. The series is set in the ''[[Star Wars]]'' [[Star Wars galaxy|galaxy]] six years before the Battle of [[Naboo]] in ''[[Star Wars Episode I: The Phantom Menace]]'', and 38 years before the Battle of Yavin in ''[[Star Wars Episode IV: A New Hope|Episode IV: A New Hope]]''. The story features [[Qui-Gon Jinn]] and [[Obi-Wan Kenobi]]. A luxury cloud cruiser has slipped out of control and is going to crash over Yorn Skot. The two Jedi must board the runaway ship and regain control. ==Synopsis== {{Empty section|date=June 2008}} ==Dramatis personae== *Bouyardy *Buck *Clode Rhoden *Madam Rhoden *[[Obi-Wan Kenobi]] *Podlong Foahl *[[Qui-Gon Jinn]] *Saul Moegantz *Waverton *[[Yoda]] <small>(Mentioned only)</small> ==Collections== *''Omnibus: Rise of the Sith'' (includes #1-2) ==External links== *{{sww|Qui-Gon and Obi-Wan: The Aurorient Express}} *[http://www.darkhorse.com/profile/profile.php?sku=11-434 Dark Horse Listing for Issue 1] *[http://www.darkhorse.com/profile/profile.php?sku=11-437 Dark Horse Listing for Issue 2] {{Use dmy dates|date=January 2011}} {{Star Wars comics}} {{DEFAULTSORT:Qui-Gon And Obi-Wan: The Aurorient Express}} [[Category:Comics based on Star Wars]] [[Category:Dark Horse Comics limited series]] {{StarWars-stub}} {{DarkHorse-Comics-stub}}
